#summary a homing worksheet along a timeline
#labels Phase-Requirements,Phase-Design,Phase-Deploy

<wiki:toc max_depth="3" />

= Introduction =

 * a homing worksheet along a timeline

== 概要 ==
 * スケジュールを自動追尾するエクセルワークシート

= Details =

 * add your excel worksheet an automatic cursor that moves along your schedules in the sheet.
 * a unit of time is flexible.
 * you can use many worksheets in a single workbook if you want.

== 説明 ==
 * エクセルワークシートのカーソルを、スケジュールに沿って自動で移動する。
 * 時間間隔は自由にできる。
 * 必要なら１つのブックに何枚ものワークシートを置いてよい。

= How to use =

 # circuit breaker
    # do `Sheet1.Break = True` to stop the automation for maintenances.
    # do `Sheet1.Break = False` to enable the automation again, or re-open the book.
    # this function is for a developer and is not for a daily use.
 # setup the timeline
    # the timeline of a virtical sheet is located at `Column A` starting at `A1` .
    # put a full date time value in each cell increasingly.
 # the cursor is automated when
    * the workbook is opened.
    * the workbook is activated.
    * the worksheet is activated.
 # the cursor is paused when
    * the workbook is closed.
    * the workbook is deactivated.
    * the worksheet is deactivated.

== 使い方 ==
 # 動作の停止
    # `Sheet1.Break = True` を行えば、メンテナンス時に自動追尾を停止できる。
    # `Sheet1.Break = False` を行うか、ブックを開きなおすと自動追尾が再開する。
    # この機能は開発者向けで、日常的に使うことは想定していない。
 # スケジュールの設定
    # 縦型スケジュールシートでは、日時を `A列` に `A1` から入れる。
    # 日時は各セルに昇順で入れる。
 # カーソルが自動追尾するのは、
    * ワークブックが開いたとき。
    * ワークブックが前面になったとき。
    * ワークシートが前面になったとき。
 # カーソルの自動追尾が止まるのは、
    * ワークブックが閉じたとき。
    * ワークブックが後面になったとき。
    * ワークシートが後面になったとき。


= Code =

=== each Worksheet ===

{{{
'code
'  name;
'{{{
Option Explicit

Private Halt As Boolean             ' for events
Private CircuitBreaker As Boolean   ' for human
Private TimerProc As String
Private LastRow As Long     ' only used on closing this book

Public Property Get Break() As Boolean
    Break = CircuitBreaker
End Property

Public Property Let Break(TrueToStop As Boolean)
    CircuitBreaker = TrueToStop
    If TrueToStop Then RemoveTimer LastRow
End Property

Public Property Get Pause() As Boolean
    Pause = Halt
End Property

Public Property Let Pause(TrueToPause As Boolean)
    Halt = TrueToPause
    If TrueToPause Then
        RemoveTimer LastRow
    Else
        Me.Activate ' this is safe, because the event `activated` is not raised if already active.
        Continue
    End If
End Property

Friend Sub Start()
    Break = False
    Pause = False
End Sub

Friend Sub PrepareClose()
    Break = True
End Sub

Friend Sub Continue()
    If Halt Or CircuitBreaker Then Exit Sub
    
    Dim r As Long
    If TimerProc = "" Then TimerProc = Me.CodeName & ".Continue"
    r = Task
    LastRow = r
    Application.OnTime GetTheTime(r + 1), TimerProc
End Sub

Private Sub RemoveTimer(r As Long)
    If TimerProc = "" Then Exit Sub
    On Error Resume Next
    Application.OnTime GetTheTime(r + 1), TimerProc, Schedule:=False
End Sub

Private Function GetTheTime(r As Long) As Date
    GetTheTime = Cells(r, 1).Value
End Function

Private Function LocateNow() As Long
    Dim Ra As Range
    Dim r As Long
    Dim NowMin As Double
    Dim NowMax As Double
    
    Set Ra = Range("A1:A" & Cells.SpecialCells(xlCellTypeLastCell).Row)
    r = ActiveCell.Row
    
    If Ra.Count = 1 Then
        r = 1
        GoTo DONE
    End If
    
    If r > Ra.Count Then r = Ra.Count - 1
    
    NowMin = CDbl(Now()) - 0.000001   ' -0.08sec
    NowMax = CDbl(Now()) + 0.000001   ' +0.08sec
    
    Do While Ra(r).Value > NowMin
        If r = 1 Then GoTo DONE
        r = r - 1
    Loop
    
    Do While Ra(r + 1).Value < NowMax
        If r = Ra.Count Then GoTo DONE
        r = r + 1
    Loop
    
DONE:
    If r = Ra.Count Then Halt = True
    Set Ra = Nothing
    LocateNow = r
End Function

Private Function Task() As Long
    On Error Resume Next
    ' Range.Select may fail when the book or the sheet is not active
    Dim r As Long
    
    r = LocateNow
    With Cells(r, 1)
        .Select
        .Show
    End With
    
    Task = r
End Function

Private Sub Worksheet_Activate()
    Pause = False
End Sub

Private Sub Worksheet_Deactivate()
    Pause = True
End Sub
'}}}


}}}

=== the Workbook ===

* this is an example for a single timeline worksheet as Sheet1.
    これは、 Sheet1 という１つのスケジュールシートがある時の見本。
    
{{{
'code
'  name;ThisWorkbook
'{{{
Option Explicit

Private Sub Workbook_Open()
    Sheet1.Start
End Sub

Private Sub Workbook_BeforeClose(Cancel As Boolean)
    Sheet1.PrepareClose
End Sub

Private Sub Workbook_Activate()
    Sheet1.Pause = False
End Sub

Private Sub Workbook_Deactivate()
    Sheet1.Pause = True
End Sub
'}}}

'  name;Sheet1
'{{{
Option Explicit

Private Halt As Boolean             ' for events
Private CircuitBreaker As Boolean   ' for human
Private TimerProc As String
Private LastRow As Long     ' only used on closing this book

Public Property Get Break() As Boolean
    Break = CircuitBreaker
End Property

Public Property Let Break(TrueToStop As Boolean)
    CircuitBreaker = TrueToStop
    If TrueToStop Then RemoveTimer LastRow
End Property

Public Property Get Pause() As Boolean
    Pause = Halt
End Property

Public Property Let Pause(TrueToPause As Boolean)
    Halt = TrueToPause
    If TrueToPause Then
        RemoveTimer LastRow
    Else
        Me.Activate ' this is safe, because the event `activated` is not raised if already active.
        Continue
    End If
End Property

Friend Sub Start()
    Break = False
    Pause = False
End Sub

Friend Sub PrepareClose()
    Break = True
End Sub

Friend Sub Continue()
    If Halt Or CircuitBreaker Then Exit Sub
    
    Dim r As Long
    If TimerProc = "" Then TimerProc = Me.CodeName & ".Continue"
    r = Task
    LastRow = r
    Application.OnTime GetTheTime(r + 1), TimerProc
End Sub

Private Sub RemoveTimer(r As Long)
    If TimerProc = "" Then Exit Sub
    On Error Resume Next
    Application.OnTime GetTheTime(r + 1), TimerProc, Schedule:=False
End Sub

Private Function GetTheTime(r As Long) As Date
    GetTheTime = Cells(r, 1).Value
End Function

Private Function LocateNow() As Long
    Dim Ra As Range
    Dim r As Long
    Dim NowMin As Double
    Dim NowMax As Double
    
    Set Ra = Range("A1:A" & Cells.SpecialCells(xlCellTypeLastCell).Row)
    r = ActiveCell.Row
    
    If Ra.Count = 1 Then
        r = 1
        GoTo DONE
    End If
    
    If r > Ra.Count Then r = Ra.Count - 1
    
    NowMin = CDbl(Now()) - 0.000001   ' -0.08sec
    NowMax = CDbl(Now()) + 0.000001   ' +0.08sec
    
    Do While Ra(r).Value > NowMin
        If r = 1 Then GoTo DONE
        r = r - 1
    Loop
    
    Do While Ra(r + 1).Value < NowMax
        If r = Ra.Count Then GoTo DONE
        r = r + 1
    Loop
    
DONE:
    If r = Ra.Count Then Halt = True
    Set Ra = Nothing
    LocateNow = r
End Function

Private Function Task() As Long
    On Error Resume Next
    ' Range.Select may fail when the book or the sheet is not active
    Dim r As Long
    
    r = LocateNow
    With Cells(r, 1)
        .Select
        .Show
    End With
    
    Task = r
End Function

Private Sub Worksheet_Activate()
    Pause = False
End Sub

Private Sub Worksheet_Deactivate()
    Pause = True
End Sub
'}}}

{{{
'code
'  name;
'{{{
Option Explicit

Private Halt As Boolean             ' for events
Private CircuitBreaker As Boolean   ' for human
Private TimerProc As String
Private LastRow As Long     ' only used on closing this book

Public Property Get Break() As Boolean
    Break = CircuitBreaker
End Property

Public Property Let Break(TrueToStop As Boolean)
    CircuitBreaker = TrueToStop
    If TrueToStop Then RemoveTimer LastRow
End Property

Public Property Get Pause() As Boolean
    Pause = Halt
End Property

Public Property Let Pause(TrueToPause As Boolean)
    Halt = TrueToPause
    If TrueToPause Then
        RemoveTimer LastRow
    Else
        Me.Activate ' this is safe, because the event `activated` is not raised if already active.
        Continue
    End If
End Property

Friend Sub Start()
    Break = False
    Pause = False
End Sub

Friend Sub PrepareClose()
    Break = True
End Sub

Friend Sub Continue()
    If Halt Or CircuitBreaker Then Exit Sub
    
    Dim r As Long
    If TimerProc = "" Then TimerProc = Me.CodeName & ".Continue"

    LastRow = r
    Application.OnTime GetTheTime(r + 1), TimerProc

Private Sub RemoveTimer(r As Long)
    If TimerProc = "" Then Exit Sub
    On Error Resume Next
    Application.OnTime GetTheTime(r + 1), TimerProc, Schedule:=False
End Sub

Private Function GetTheTime(c As Long) As Date
    GetTheTime = Cells(1, c).Value
End Function

Private Function LocateNow() As Long
    Dim Ra As Range
    Dim c As Long
    Dim NowMin As Double
    Dim NowMax As Double
    
    Set Ra = Range("A1", Cells.SpecialCells(xlCellTypeLastCell)).Rows(1).Cells
    c = ActiveCell.Column
    
    If Ra.Count = 1 Then
        c = 1
        GoTo DONE
    End If
    
    If c > Ra.Count Then c = Ra.Count - 1
    
    NowMin = CDbl(Now()) - 0.000001   ' -0.08sec

    Loop
    
DONE:

    Set Ra = Nothing
    LocateNow = c
End Function

    ' Range.Select may fail when the book or the sheet is not active

'code
'  name;Sheet1
'{{{
Option Explicit

Private Halt As Boolean             ' for events
Private CircuitBreaker As Boolean   ' for human
Private TimerProc As String
Private LastRow As Long     ' only used on closing this book

Public Property Get Break() As Boolean
    Break = CircuitBreaker
End Property

Public Property Let Break(TrueToStop As Boolean)
    CircuitBreaker = TrueToStop
    If TrueToStop Then RemoveTimer LastRow
End Property

Public Property Get Pause() As Boolean
    Pause = Halt
End Property

Public Property Let Pause(TrueToPause As Boolean)
    Halt = TrueToPause
    If TrueToPause Then
        RemoveTimer LastRow
    Else
        Me.Activate ' this is safe, because the event `activated` is not raised if already active.
        Continue
    End If
End Property

Friend Sub Start()
    Break = False
    Pause = False
End Sub

Friend Sub PrepareClose()
    Break = True
End Sub

Friend Sub Continue()
    If Halt Or CircuitBreaker Then Exit Sub
    
    Dim r As Long
    If TimerProc = "" Then TimerProc = Me.CodeName & ".Continue"
    r = Task
    LastRow = r
    Application.OnTime GetTheTime(r + 1), TimerProc
End Sub

Private Sub RemoveTimer(r As Long)
    If TimerProc = "" Then Exit Sub
    On Error Resume Next
    Application.OnTime GetTheTime(r + 1), TimerProc, Schedule:=False
End Sub

Private Function GetTheTime(c As Long) As Date
    GetTheTime = Cells(1, c).Value
End Function

Private Function LocateNow() As Long
    Dim Ra As Range
    Dim c As Long
    Dim NowMin As Double
    Dim NowMax As Double
    
    Set Ra = Range("A1", Cells.SpecialCells(xlCellTypeLastCell)).Rows(1).Cells
    c = ActiveCell.Column
    
    If Ra.Count = 1 Then
        c = 1
        GoTo DONE
    End If
    
    If c > Ra.Count Then c = Ra.Count - 1
    
    NowMin = CDbl(Now()) - 0.000001   ' -0.08sec
    NowMax = CDbl(Now()) + 0.000001   ' +0.08sec
    
    Do While Ra(c).Value > NowMin
        If c = 1 Then GoTo DONE
        c = c - 1
    Loop
    
    Do While Ra(c + 1).Value < NowMax
        If c = Ra.Count Then GoTo DONE
        c = c + 1
    Loop
    
DONE:
    If c = Ra.Count Then Halt = True
    Set Ra = Nothing
    LocateNow = c
End Function

Private Function Task() As Long
    On Error Resume Next
    ' Range.Select may fail when the book or the sheet is not active
    Dim c As Long
    
    c = LocateNow
    With Cells(1, c)
        .Select
        .Show
    End With
    
    Task = c
End Function

Private Sub Worksheet_Activate()
    Pause = False
End Sub

Private Sub Worksheet_Deactivate()
    Pause = True
End Sub
'}}}

'code
'  name;ThisWorkbook
'{{{
Option Explicit

Private Sub Workbook_Open()
    Sheet1.Start
End Sub

Private Sub Workbook_BeforeClose(Cancel As Boolean)
    Sheet1.PrepareClose
End Sub

Private Sub Workbook_Activate()
    Sheet1.Pause = False
End Sub

Private Sub Workbook_Deactivate()
    Sheet1.Pause = True
End Sub
'}}}
